entry.title: Testing Comamnd-Line Applications with Aruba
entry.summary:
In the last couple of weeks I have been working, with a little project of my own. I always love Command Line Tools, I donâ€™t know what they have but using them make feel more like a Hackers or someone that actually know what he is doing.

So I decided to build one, with the help of a gem called Thor, which by the way is a great gem, that help you build your CLI really easy.
